name: OPI & FACTO
description:
OPI & FACTO

We are Savvy, a team of 4 people who want to explore new ways of doing Open Education. We get together every week for a 8-hours jam to experiment on the new opportunities in educational resources and collective intelligence.

This time we wanted to work on OPINIONS vs FACTS: nothing is more annoying in a constructive debate than someone submitting opinions as facts [that is an opinion], so we figured we'd do a simple game to practice on the difference. You will learn, or you will keep on dying in it [that is a fact].

We made this game in one "8 hours Jam" so please be gentle. We hope you enjoy it!

Made by Delphin Casado, Lola El Koubi, Tom Rivière and Frédéric Urien.
